To examine this possibility, Balch (2005) essentially replicated Carney and Levin’s study, with the addition of two study conditions. One of these conditions required the participant, after seeing the term and its definition, to produce a paraphrase of the definition of the term, and the other condition required the participant to generate examples of the term. In both of these cases, the material would have to be subjected to some degree of elaborative and generative processing to accomplish the study tasks. When compared to the keyword method, generating examples of the term yielded comparable performance on both a test of memory for the definitions and a test of the ability to apply the term. Paraphrasing the definition, a technique frequently recommended to students, was no better than rote repetition at study.

关键词助记符对新术语及其定义的习得具有促进作用，这为新术语及其含义的习得提供了有希望的教学支持。从 Balch 的结果可以明显看出，其他技巧也可以和关键词方法一样有效，但这些其他技巧几乎肯定需要学生至少与助记符一样多的积极参与，并且可能比关键词助记符更难、更容易出错。Balch 的数据表明，生成新概念的例子有助于学习该概念，但学生可能难以生成不熟悉概念的新实例，更糟糕的是，可能会生成错误的例子。另一方面，在这种情况下，关于关键词技巧仍有许多东西有待学习。特别是，我们仍然需要了解它在较长的保留间隔内的有效性，以及学生在初步训练后自发使用该方法的可能性有多大。

The facilitative effect of the keyword mnemonic on the acquisition of novel terms and their definitions offers promising pedagogical support for the acquisition of new terms and their meaning. As is evident from Balch’s results, other techniques can be just as effective as the keyword method, but these other techniques almost certainly will require at least as much active involvement from the student as the mnemonic and may be more difficult and error prone than a keyword mnemonic. Balch’s data show that generating examples of a new concept facilitates learning of that concept, but students may have difficulty generating novel instances of unfamiliar concepts and, worse, may generate erroneous examples. On the other hand, much remains to be learned about the keyword technique in this context. In particular, we still need to know about its effectiveness over longer retention intervals and how likely it is that students will spontaneously use the method after their initial training on it.

学习关系

Learning Relationships

学习新习得的概念之间的关系比习得词汇和术语更为复杂。人们不仅需要习得单个概念，还需要掌握构成层级关系的具体相互联系。

Learning the relationships among newly acquired concepts is a more complex problem than is the acquisition of vocabulary and terms. One has to acquire individual concepts as well as the specific interconnections that constitute hierarchical relationships.

这种学习方式在从科学分类学到谱系等各个学科领域都是一种常见的需求。历史。在大多数情况下，需要逐字记忆。这样的要求非常适合应用正式的记忆术。

This type of learning is not an uncommon demand across the spectrum of academic disciplines from the taxonomies of science to the genealogies of history. In most of these cases, verbatim memory is required. Such a requirement is the perfect setting for application of formal mnemonics.

目前已有关于将助记技巧应用于概念间关系学习的研究。以一个相对简单的关系学习任务为例，八年级科学课的学生被要求通过阅读说明性文本（Levin、Morrison、McGivern、Mastropieri & Scruggs，1986）来学习八种矿物及其三种属性。他们被要求使用三种学习方法中的一种。在助记条件下，每种矿物的名称都与一个感知相似的关键词相关联，而这些关键词又与实验者提供的图画中该矿物的三种属性相关联。在摘要条件下，参与者在阅读文本时，以图形形式查看有关矿物及其属性的信息。在自由学习条件下，学生被要求使用自己的方法来学习材料。在即时和三天延迟的属性识别测试中，助记学习条件在所有指标上均取得了最佳表现。此外，学生们认为该策略比其他两种学习方法更有用。这些数据表明，中学生可以有效地利用关键词方法来学习说明文的材料。

Some research now is available on the application of mnemonic techniques to learning of relationships among concepts. As an example of a relatively simple relational learning task, students in an eighth-grade science class were asked to learn eight minerals along with three properties of each mineral from their reading of expository text (Levin, Morrison, McGivern, Mastropieri, & Scruggs, 1986). They were instructed to use one of three study methods. In the mnemonic condition, each mineral’s name was associated with a perceptually similar keyword, which in turn was related to the three properties of the mineral in an experimenter-supplied drawing. Participants in the summary condition saw the information about the minerals and their properties in graphical form while reading the text. In the free study condition, the students were told to use their own methods to learn the material. On both immediate and 3-day delayed tests for property identification, the mnemonic study condition produced the best performance on all of the measures. Moreover, the students rated the strategy as more useful than the other two study techniques. These data demonstrate that middle school students can advantageously use the keyword method to learn material from expository text.

Levin 等人 (1986) 使用的方法已扩展到更复杂的学习问题，涉及更大的关系结构以及嵌入该结构中的具体事实。Rosenheck、Levin 和 Levin (1989) 扩展了原始方法，向学生教授植物学分类法、植物组名称的层次结构及其具体特征。要学习的材料是 16 个植物组分类系统，用 12 页的说明性文字描述。每个植物组的名称及其主要特征分为四个层次。参与者是大学生，他们被要求通读课文两遍，首先关注组之间的关系，然后在第二次阅读时关注具体的植物组名称及其特征。在阅读材料之前，学生被要求使用助记策略、分类策略或自由学习。

The procedure used by Levin et al. (1986) has been extended to a much more complex learning problem involving a larger relational structure as well as specific facts embedded in that structure. Rosenheck, Levin, and Levin (1989) expanded the original procedure by teaching students botany taxonomies, hierarchical structures of plant-group names, and their specific characteristics. The material to be learned was the classification system for 16 plant groups, which was described in 12 pages of expository text. The name of each plant group and its major characteristic were included for four hierarchical levels. The participants were university students who were instructed to read through the text twice, focusing on the relationships among the groups first and then on the specific plant-group name and its characteristics on the second reading. Prior to reading the material, students were instructed to use a mnemonic strategy, a taxonomic strategy, or free study.

助记策略首先需要学习每个植物名称的关键词。例如，被子植物、双子叶植物、红花目、无患子目和蔷薇目相应的关键词分别是天使、恐龙、魔方、树液和玫瑰。被子植物是双子叶植物纲的一个分支，而双子叶植物纲是红花目、无患子目和蔷薇目之上的。一旦掌握了每个术语的关键词，使用助记策略的学生就开始通过图形助记符来学习术语之间的关系。图 7.1就是一个这样的装置的例子，它被设计用来描述被子植物和双子叶植物之间的等级关系。在第二个在以植物特征为重点的阅读中，每种植物都使用不同的图片记忆法。例如，被子植物的特征是开花，并用一张天使手捧鲜花的图片来说明。分类学学习小组没有学习关键词，而是从熟悉植物组名开始。第一次阅读课文时，他们会收到一张分类图作为参考；第二次阅读时，课文中会突出显示与该植物及其特征相关的信息。自由学习小组的学生可以根据需要做笔记。后来的测试表明，助记学习条件对文本中的特定关系和属性信息产生了最佳记忆，并且在需要将新实例分类到研究类别的测试中表现出色。

The mnemonic strategy entailed first learning keywords for each plant name. For example, the respective keywords for angiosperm, dicotyledon, rubiales, sapindales, and rosales were angel, dinosaur, Rubik’s (cube), sap, and rose, respectively. Angiosperm is the subdivision that subsumes the class dicotyledon, which is superordinate to the orders rubiales, sapindales, and rosales. Once the keywords for each of the terms were learned, the students using the mnemonic strategy began to learn the relationships among the terms using pictorial mnemonics. An example of one such device is shown in Figure 7.1, which is designed to depict the hierarchical relationship between angiosperm and dicotyledon. On the second reading where the focus was to be on the plant’s characteristic, a different picture mnemonic was used for each plant. For example, the characteristic of angiosperms was produces flowers, and a picture of an angel holding a bouquet of flowers illustrated it. Rather than learning keywords, the taxonomic study group started by familiarizing themselves with the plant-group names. Then on the first reading of the text, they were given a taxonomic chart to accompany the text, and on the second reading, the relevant information about the plant and its characteristic was highlighted in the text. The students in the free study group took notes if they wanted. Later tests revealed that the mnemonic study condition produced the best memory for the specific relational and property information in the text as well as superior performance on a test that required classification of new instances to the studied categories.

图 7.1用于学习双子叶植物（恐龙-蜥蜴）是被子植物亚门（天使）下的一个植物纲的图片助记符。摘自 Rosenheck, MB, Levin, ME 和 Levin, JR，1989 年，《教育心理学杂志》，第 81 卷（2 期）。经授权。

Figure 7.1 Picture mnemonic used to learn that dicotyledon (dino-saur) is a class of plants in the subdivision angiosperm (angel). From Rosenheck, M. B., Levin, M. E., & Levin, J. R., 1989, Journal of Educational Psychology, 81(2). With permission.

后一项发现非常令人印象深刻，因为对新实例进行分类需要使用超出记忆范围的已获得信息。当然，这项任务的助记优势可能是由于特定术语的记忆优势，但 Carney 和 Levin (2003) 的后续研究表明事实并非如此。Carney 和 Levin 将最初学习的基本名称等同起来，但在分类法中的关系及其扩展到新实例的测试中，他们仍然发现他们的助记条件具有优势。总的来说，这一系列实验非常令人印象深刻，表明关键词方法与图形助记符的结合有助于在长达 2 个月的时间内获得结构关系和具体事实。尤其重要的是证明助记符学习有益于将所学材料应用于问题解决测试中的新实例。

This latter finding is very impressive because classification of new instances required the use of the acquired information over and above its memory. Of course, the mnemonic advantage to this task may have been due to the memory advantage for specific terms, but a follow-up study by Carney and Levin (2003) suggests this is not the case. Carney and Levin equated the original learning of the basic names but still found an advantage for their mnemonic condition on tests for the relationships within the taxonomy and their extension to new instances. Overall, this series of experiments is quite impressive in showing that the combination of the keyword method with a pictorial mnemonic facilitates acquisition of structural relationships as well as of specific facts for intervals up to 2 months. Especially important is the demonstration that the mnemonic study benefited application of the learned material to novel instances in the problem-solving test.

最后选择了关系学习领域的一个例子来说明将助记符与测试相匹配的重要性。在本例中，学生们学会了识别特定艺术家的画作（Carney & Levin，2000b）。在测试中，我们将两种不同的助记符学习技术与自学进行了对比，以保留原始学习成果并将其转移到识别所研究艺术家的新画作。助记符学习条件从呈现艺术家的名字以及发音相似的关键词开始。对照组参与者只是看到艺术家的名字。助记符条件的下一阶段研究包括呈现一幅画作，并附上艺术家的名字和关键词，以及一幅与关键词和画作某个方面相关的交互式图像的描述。在详细助记符条件下，图像将注意力吸引到该画作的特定细节上。在一般助记符条件下，图像将注意力吸引到艺术家的典型主题或风格上。第二阶段的自由研究参与者使用对他们来说最有效的技术将艺术家的名字与绘画联系起来。

A final example in the domain of relational learning was chosen to illustrate the importance of matching the mnemonic to the test. In this case, students learned to identify the paintings of particular artists (Carney & Levin, 2000b). Two variations of a mnemonic study technique were contrasted with self-study on tests for retention of the original learning as well as for transfer to the identification of new paintings by the studied artists. The mnemonic study conditions began with the presentation of the artists’ names along with a phonetically similar keyword. The control participants simply saw the artists’ names. The next stage of study for the mnemonic conditions entailed presentation of a painting accompanied by the artist’s name and keyword as well as a description of an interactive image relating the keyword and an aspect of the painting. In the detailed mnemonic condition, the image drew attention to a specific detail of that painting. In the general mnemonic condition, the image drew attention to a characteristic theme or style of the artist. The free study participants in this second stage used whatever techniques worked best for them to associate the artist’s name with the painting.

学习结束后，所有参与者立即接受测试，并在两天后再次接受测试，以评估他们将学习的画作与正确的艺术家进行匹配的能力，以及识别出学习艺术家的新画作的能力。在原始材料记忆测试中，记忆法组的表现优于自学组，且两组之间并无差异。然而，在新画作记忆测试中，一般记忆法组表现出最高的原始经验迁移水平，而详细记忆法组与自学组并无差异。这一结果与基本原理预测一致迁移适配加工（Morris、Bransford & Franks，1977）。也就是说，最佳的学习程序是与后续测试要求相匹配的程序；在这种情况下，识别知名艺术家作品的新范例，最好的方法是学习该艺术家作品的一般主题或技术方面。这些结果很好地说明了精心设计的记忆技巧在增强新学信息的获取和迁移方面的有效性。

Following the study session, all participants were tested immediately and then again 2 days later for their ability to match the studied paintings with the correct artists and to identify new paintings from the studied artists. On the tests for retention of the original material, the mnemonics groups outperformed the self-study group and did not differ between themselves. On the test for new paintings, however, the general mnemonics group showed the highest level of transfer from the original experience, whereas the detailed mnemonics group did not differ from the self-study group. This outcome was predicted from the basic principle of transfer-appropriate processing (Morris, Bransford, & Franks, 1977). Namely, the best study procedure is one that matches the demands of a later test; in this case, the demand to recognize a new example of a known artist’s work is best met by studying general themes or technical aspects that characterize the artist’s work. These results nicely illustrate the effectiveness of appropriately planned mnemonic techniques for enhancing the acquisition and transfer of newly learned information.

总体而言，关系学习在正规教育中普遍存在，而助记技巧似乎对它大有裨益。Konopak 和 Williams（1988）的研究对这一概括提出了一个重要的警告，他们发现 Levin 等人（1986）使用的助记符并没有帮助学习能力低于平均水平的学生提高成绩。考虑到关键词教学法的复杂性，这一结果并不令人意外，但它是一个值得遵循的重要线索。

On the whole, relational learning, which is a ubiquitous demand in formal education, seems to benefit from mnemonic techniques. An important caveat to this generalization comes from research by Konopak and Williams (1988), who found that the mnemonic used by Levin et al. (1986) did not facilitate performance for students of below average learning ability. This result is not surprising given the complexity of the keyword method, but it is an important lead that needs to be followed.

话语记忆和位置记忆法

Memory for Discourse and Loci Mnemonics

教育，无论正式还是非正式，通常都涉及从散漫的演讲中提取、学习和记忆要点。材料可以以口头或书面形式呈现，但无论哪种形式，目标都是学习演讲中所传达的要点。虽然关于记忆术对演讲记忆的影响的研究很少，但 De Beni、Moe 和 Cornoldi（1997）报告的数据表明，位置记忆术对口头演讲（例如讲座）的记忆有促进作用。

Education, both formal and informal, often is a matter of extracting, learning, and remembering important points from discursive presentations. The material may be presented in oral or written form, but in either case the goal is to learn the important points carried by the discourse. Although little research is available on the effect of mnemonics on memory for discourse, De Beni, Moe, and Cornoldi (1997) reported data showing a facilitating effect of loci mnemonics on memory for spoken discourse such as a lecture.

在本研究中，高中生接受了6小时的训练，学习如何将位置记忆法应用于语篇。最初的训练侧重于图像的形成，随后的训练环节是记忆学生所在城镇的20个地点。接下来，学生被要求练习理解语篇，选择能够概括文章特定部分含义的提示词，形成这些提示词的图像，并在脑海中将这些图像与城镇的某个地点联系起来。对照组也接受了6小时的实验前训练，学习如何通过排练记忆语篇。最后一次训练结束一周后，学生被要求使用他们之前接受的训练方法学习600至800个单词的段落。在呈现段落后，立即进行回忆，重点是记住正确顺序的要点。在三个实验中，文本内容各不相同，回忆测试分别在即刻和延迟后进行。无论文本内容和记忆间隔如何，记忆训练后对话语段落的记忆都表现出令人印象深刻的优势。尽管如果需要培训课程，助记符相对于传统复习策略的优势可能会抵消培训的时间成本。

In this study, high school students received 6 hours of training on the use of loci mnemonics as applied to discourse. The initial instruction focused on the formation of images and was followed by a session in which 20 locations in the students’ town were memorized. Next, the students were given practice in understanding discourse, selecting cue words that summarized the meaning of select portions of the passage, forming images of those cue words, and mentally placing those images at one of the town’s locations. The control condition also received 6 hours of preexperimental training on the use of rehearsal to remember discourse. One week after the last training session, the students were asked to learn passages (600 to 800 words) using the method by which they were trained. Immediately following presentation of the passages, recall was requested with an emphasis on memory for the main points in their correct order. Across three experiments, the texts were varied, and recall was tested both immediately and following a delay. Memory for the discourse passage showed an impressive advantage following mnemonic training regardless of the text and retention interval. In spite of the rather heroic training session required, the benefit of the mnemonic over the traditional rehearsal strategy may offset the cost of the time in training.

Cornoldi 和 De Beni (1991) 发现了这一结论的一个非常重要的局限性，并在 De Beni 等人 (1997) 的研究中得到了重复。也就是说，位置记忆优势仅适用于口头话语。书面段落在排练后实际上记得更清楚。De Beni 等人 (1997) 在 Brooks (1967) 关于选择性干扰的经典研究中，对这种模态效应提出了有趣的解释。当以相同模态执行两个相似的任务时，其执行效率不如以不同模态执行任务时。Brooks 表明，执行需要在空间中定位物体的反应会干扰视觉图像的使用。类似地，基于图像的记忆法会干扰阅读所需的视觉处理，就像基于口头的排练会干扰口头话语的处理一样。

A very important limitation on this conclusion was discovered by Cornoldi and De Beni (1991) and replicated in the work of De Beni et al. (1997). Namely, the loci mnemonic advantage applies only to spoken discourse. Written passages actually were better remembered following rehearsal. De Beni et al. (1997) offered an interesting explanation for this modality effect in the context of Brooks’s (1967) classic study of selective interference. When two similar tasks are performed in the same modality, performance is not as efficient as when the tasks are performed in separate modalities. Brooks showed that performing a response that required locating an object in space interfered with the use of a visual image. In an analogous fashion, imagery-based mnemonics would interfere with visual processing required by reading, just as verbally based rehearsal would interfere with processing of spoken discourse.

目前看来，基于位置法的记忆训练确实有助于学习和记忆口语话语中的重要点。这些实验的程序和结果让我们回想起修辞学中记忆术的起源，因为记忆训练强度很大，并且旨在用于后续呈现的材料。然而，在推荐这些程序之前，我们希望看到更多有针对性的研究，包括像大学课堂上通常那样，在演讲中做笔记的情况。

As things stand, mnemonic training on the method of loci does seem to facilitate learning and memory for major points in spoken discourse. The procedures and results of these experiments take us back to the origins of mnemonics in rhetoric in that the mnemonic training is intense and is intended to be used on subsequently presented material. Before recommending these procedures, however, we would like to see additional programmatic research that included conditions in which notes were taken on the discourse, as normally would happen in university classrooms.

数学应用

Application to Mathematics

长期以来，人们一直利用助记符来促进简单算术原理的学习和记忆。一个典型的例子是算术运算的顺序，其中常见的助记符是：我的（乘）亲爱的（除）阿姨（加）莎莉（减）。一代又一代的学生可能仍然记得这个助记符，即使他们很少被要求解决需要这些知识的问题。然而，助记符似乎不太可能用于复杂的数学原理，但 Machida 和 Carlson (1984) 对中学代数课堂中助记符韵律使用的研究表明并非如此。

Learning and memory of simple principles of arithmetic have long been facilitated by the use of mnemonics. A standard example is the order of arithmetic operations where a common mnemonic is My (multiply) Dear (divide) Aunt (add) Sally (subtract). Generations of students probably still remember this mnemonic, even if they rarely are asked to solve problems requiring this knowledge. It seems much less likely, however, that mnemonics would be useful for complex mathematical principles, but Machida and Carlson’s (1984) study of the use of mnemonic rhymes in middle school algebra classes demonstrates otherwise.

两所不同学校的七年级代数班，学习了单项式、多项式及其解题模块，这些模块要求学生运用单项式、多项式及其解题方法，而方程、不等式及其解题方法也需要运用单项式、多项式及其解题方法。所有学生都通过讲授、探索和练习的方式接受了传统的教学，但其中一个班级在学习模块1时接受了额外的助记符教学。另一个班级在学习模块2时接受了助记符教学。助记符是一串串押韵的口语，可以与模块1中的单项式和多项式一起使用。以及模块2中的等式和不等式。后测结果显示，两个模块的助记条件都表现出色。这些结果表明，动词韵律有助于数学计算和问题解决能力的学习和记忆。

The seventh-grade algebra classes from two different schools were followed through the module on monomials, polynomials, and problem solving that required their use as the module on equations, inequalities, and problem solving using them. All students received traditional instruction through lecture, discovery, and practice, but one class received additional mnemonic instruction with Module 1. The other class received the mnemonic instruction with Module 2. The mnemonics were verbal strings of rhymes that could be used with monomials and polynomials in Module 1 and with equalities and inequalities in Module 2. The results of posttests favored the mnemonics conditions in both modules. These results show that verbal rhymes can facilitate learning and retention of mathematics computations and problem solving.

这一结论令人鼓舞，因为对数学解题错误的分析表明，学生经常遵循错误的算法，而非简单地忘记数学因素（Resnick，1981），而本文开发的助记符旨在记住算法。同样令人印象深刻的是，Machida 和 Carlson（1984）研究中的标准表现是基于新问题。虽然这类教学所能支持的迁移广度仍有待探索，但这项实验是一个良好的开端。考虑到许多学生在学习代数时遇到的挫折，创建和掌握助记符的成本或许是值得的。

Such a conclusion is encouraging in that analysis of errors made in mathematics problem solving has shown that students often follow incorrect algorithms rather than simply forgetting mathematical factors (Resnick, 1981), and the mnemonics developed here target retention of algorithms. Equally impressive is that the criterion performance in Machida and Carlson’s (1984) study was based on new problems. Although the breadth of transfer that can be supported by this type of instruction remains to be explored, this experiment is a good beginning. Given the frustration that many students experience with algebra, the cost of creating and acquiring the mnemonics may be well worth the effort.

□ 间隔学习和练习测试的好处

□ The Benefits of Spaced Study

and Practice Tests

如果我们不提及两种适用于任何学科的通用策略，那就太失职了：间隔学习和练习测试。这两种策略不仅适用范围广泛，而且教师和学生都易于实施。最重要的是，这两种策略的有效性已在受控研究环境中多次得到证实，并且在持续的课堂教学中也日益得到证实。

We would be remiss if we did not mention two general strategies that are applicable to any subject matter: spaced study and practice tests. Not only are these two strategies widely applicable, they are easy to implement by either the instructor or the student. Most importantly, the effectiveness of both strategies has been demonstrated many times in controlled research environments and, increasingly, in ongoing class situations.

如果要学习的内容学习不止一次，重复学习可以紧接着原始学习，也可以在时间间隔内进行。关于间隔学习效果的研究可以追溯到艾宾浩斯 (1885/1964) 对学习过程中练习分配的兴趣。Pashler、Rohrer、Cepeda 和 Carpenter (2007) 在对这些文献进行全面回顾后指出，对照实验一致表明间隔学习对记忆有益。此外，Pashler 等人介绍了最近的研究，表明这些益处在相当长的记忆间隔内持续存在。重要的是，Pashler 等人指出，文献中存在一种规律，建议将第一次和第二次学习片段以最佳间隔进行。该建议以学习片段之间的时间与第一次学习和最终测试之间的时间之比的形式提出。当学习片段之间的间隔为从初始学习到最终测试的时间总和的 10% 到 20% 时，最终测试记忆效果最佳。如果最终测试在第一次接触后 50 天进行，那么第二次研究的最佳时间应该是第一次研究后的 5 到 10 天。教师可以利用通过多次测试主题来掌握这些信息。准备每次考试的学生都会在不知不觉中运用间隔学习。此外，我们强烈建议教师向学生讲解这种记忆策略，并鼓励学生在日常学习中运用该策略。

If to-be-learned material is studied more than once, the repeated study can follow the original study immediately or the repetition can be spaced in time. Research on the effects of spaced study can be traced all the way back to Ebbinghaus’s (1885/1964) interest in distribution of practice during learning, and in their thorough review of this literature, Pashler, Rohrer, Cepeda, and Carpenter (2007) pointed out that controlled experiments have consistently shown benefits to retention of spaced study. Moreover, Pashler et al. described recent research that shows that these benefits persist over substantial retention intervals. Importantly, Pashler et al. suggested that there is regularity in the literature that recommends the optimal separation of the first and second study episode. This recommendation comes in the form of a ratio relating the time between study episodes to the time between the first study and the final test. Final test memory is optimal when study episodes are separated by 10% to 20% of the amount of time from initial study to final test. If the final test occurs 50 days after the first exposure, the optimal time for the second study would be 5 to 10 days after the first study. An instructor can take advantage of this information by testing topics more than once. The students who prepare for each test will use spaced study without knowing that they are doing so. In addition, we highly recommend that instructors educate their students about this mnemonic strategy and encourage students to implement the strategy in their study routine.

还应鼓励学生充分利用测试效应。研究一致表明，测试记忆对于长期记忆的帮助至少与额外的学习环节一样大，甚至往往更大（详见Roediger & Karpicke, 2007）。定期测试可以让人们评估自己对学习材料的了解程度和未知程度，元认知研究（Dunlosky, Serra & Baker, 2007）也强调了这一点。此外，测试本身也有助于记忆。Pyc和Rawson（2009）证明，测试的长期效益与检索答案的难度直接相关。在他们的研究中，Pyc和Rawson设定了一些条件，在学习待学习材料的过程中，需要检索正确的答案，以确保始终能够检索到正确的答案。他们改变了特定答案的检索尝试之间的间隔，发现检索间隔越长，最终的学习效果越好，尽管间隔越长，学习时的检索就越困难。

Students also should be encouraged to take advantage of the test effect. Research has consistently shown that testing memory is at least as useful and often more so than is an additional study episode for long-term retention (see Roediger & Karpicke, 2007, for a thorough review). Periodic testing allows one to assess what one knows and does not know about material, a fact emphasized by metacognitive research (Dunlosky, Serra, & Baker, 2007), but in addition, testing itself facilitates retention. Pyc and Rawson (2009) demonstrated that the long-term benefits of testing are a direct function of the difficulty in retrieving the answer. In their research, Pyc and Rawson set up conditions in which study of the to-be-learned material involved retrieving correct answers, ensuring that the correct answer was always retrieved. They varied the intervals between retrieval attempts of particular answers and found that the longer the interval between retrievals, the better the ultimate learning, even though the longer intervals made for more difficult retrieval at study.

尽管自我测试的优势显而易见，但 Roediger 和 Karpicke 指出，许多学生并没有始终如一地使用这种简单的策略。如果学生没有意识到测试的优势，教师可以鼓励他们将这种记忆策略作为日常学习的一部分。此外，教师可以通过多次测试某个主题（例如累积考试）来产生测试效果。如上所述，同时备考两种测试的学生不仅可以获得间隔学习的好处，还可以享受测试效果对长期记忆的促进作用。这两种策略都易于使用，并且为教育和其他用途提供了巨大的记忆益处。

As obvious as the advantage of self-testing may appear, Roediger and Karpicke pointed out that this simple strategy is not used consistently by many students. To the extent that the student is unaware of the advantages of testing, the instructor can encourage this mnemonic strategy as part of the study routine. Furthermore, the instructor can impose a test effect by testing a given topic more than once, for example, cumulative exams. As mentioned above, the student who studies for both tests will incur not only the benefit of spaced study but also the facilitative effect of the test effect on long-term retention. Both of these strategies are easy to use and provide tremendous mnemonic benefits for education as well as for other purposes.

□尚待研究和应用的问题

□ Remaining Research and Application Issues

我们已审查的研究以及其他类似的研究普遍报告了在教育环境中使用助记符的积极成果。虽然其中一些研究是在实际课程或与这些情况非常相似的环境中进行的，但也有一些研究是在受控的实验室实验中进行的。受控实验如果操作得当，能够产生明确的数据，其价值是无价的，但它们通常没有考虑到助记符的实用性。在实际课程中实施。结果是，即使我们知道助记符可以促进记忆，使用助记符的决定也必须权衡其益处和潜在成本。

The studies we have reviewed and others like them generally report positive results from the use of mnemonics in educational settings. Although some of this research has been conducted in actual courses or in settings that closely mimic those circumstances, some of the work has occurred in controlled laboratory experiments. Controlled experiments, when properly conducted, are invaluable for their yield of unambiguous data, but they usually are not performed with an eye toward the practicality of implementation in a live course situation. The upshot is that even if we know that a mnemonic device can benefit memory, the decision to use the mnemonic must weigh the benefit against potential costs.

最明显的成本或许是开发、教授或学习以及应用助记符所需的时间和精力。这些成本与助记符的复杂性成正比。例如，请考虑Rosenheck等人（1989）教授植物分类层次结构所使用的程序。该程序的材料如图7.1所示。生成这种复杂的助记符以及随后准备支持材料需要付出巨大的努力，而且可能超出大多数教师可用的资源。同样，教授诸如Machida和Carlson（1984）用来促进代数原理习得的技巧所需的时间，可能不得不以牺牲实质性主题为代价，这种牺牲很难令人接受。基础研究可以为决策提供信息，包括对学习和记忆益处的合理预期，以及相对于次优策略实施该助记符的成本的明确描述。

Perhaps the most obvious costs are the time and effort required to develop, teach or learn, and apply the mnemonic. These costs are directly proportional to the complexity of the mnemonic device. Consider, for example, the procedures used by Rosenheck et al. (1989) to teach the taxonomic hierarchy for plants. Materials for this procedure are illustrated in Figure 7.1. Generation of mnemonics of this complexity and subsequent preparation of the supporting materials require substantial effort and may well be beyond the resources available to most instructors. Likewise, the time required to teach techniques such as those used by Machida and Carlson (1984) to facilitate the acquisition of principles of algebra may have to come at the expense of substantive topics, a sacrifice that is hard to justify. Basic research can inform the decision with information about reasonable expectations for benefits to learning and memory along with explicit depictions of the costs of implementing the mnemonic relative to the next best strategy.

如果教师决定使用助记符，那么应该认真考虑由谁来生成助记符：学生还是教师。仅以基本的记忆研究为指导，答案很简单。根据生成效应，自我生成的材料比其他呈现的材料更容易被记住（Slamecka & Graf, 1978），因此人们会选择学生生成。但在实际课程设置中，应根据助记符的复杂性来做出决定。显然，如果该手段太具挑战性，学生将无法或不愿自己使用它。保守的方法是始终使用教师生成的技术，至少在学生能够适应生成成功助记符的要求之前。

If an instructor decides to use a mnemonic, an issue that should be given considerable thought is who should generate the mnemonic, the student or the instructor. Using only basic memory research as a guide, the answer is easy. In accord with the generation effect, self-generated material is better remembered than other-presented material (Slamecka & Graf, 1978), so one would opt for student generation. But in the actual course setting, that decision should be made in light of the complexity of the mnemonic. Obviously if the device is too challenging, the students will be unable or unwilling to use it on their own. The conservative approach would be to always use instructor-generated techniques, at least until the students are comfortable with the demands underlying the generation of a successful mnemonic.

如果我们有更多研究作为指导，那么回答谁应该生成助记符这个问题会更容易。一些现有研究将助记符的来源作为变量，但结果并不一致（例如，与Bloom & Lamkin, 2006；Bobrow & Bower, 1969；以及Patton, D'Agaro & Gaudette, 1991的研究结果对比）。这种不一致或许可以通过程序化地考察自我生成技术与他人生成技术的有效性，并将其与助记符的材料和复杂性进行比较来消除。

Answering this question about who should generate the mnemonic would be easier if we had more research to guide us. Some existing research includes the source of the mnemonic as a variable, and the results are inconsistent (e.g., contrast Bloom & Lamkin, 2006; Bobrow & Bower, 1969; with Patton, D’Agaro, & Gaudette, 1991). This inconsistency probably could be eliminated through programmatic examination of the effectiveness of self- versus other-generated techniques as a function of the material and the complexity of the mnemonic.

另一个我们存在争议的重要方面是助记符对长期记忆的影响。一些研究表明，使用助记符不仅能增强习得能力，还能促进长期记忆。这里的问题部分在于，“长期”很少超过1个月，而另一部分在于现有数据也存在不一致（Bloom & Lamkin, 2006; Carney & Levin, 2000a）。基础研究表明，简化新材料的习得往往以牺牲该材料的长期记忆为代价，因此解决这个问题至关重要（Bjork，1994）。这里的关键在于，助记符可能以牺牲学习的长期效果为代价，换取短期的学习便利。必要的研究是再次对记忆问题进行系统性攻克，使用各种材料和助记符，研究记忆时长至少为1年。

Another important dimension on which we have conflicting information is the effect of mnemonics on long-term retention. Some research suggests that the use of mnemonics not only enhances acquisition but also facilitates longer term retention. Part of the issue here is that “longer term” rarely exceeds 1 month, whereas another part is that again the existing data are inconsistent (Bloom & Lamkin, 2006; Carney & Levin, 2000a). Resolution of this issue is very important in the context of basic research showing that easing acquisition of new material often comes at the cost of long-term retention of that material (Bjork, 1994). At stake here is the possibility that mnemonics purchase a short-term facilitation at the expense of long-term effects of the learning. The necessary research is again a programmatic attack on the retention issue using various materials and mnemonics over a range of retention of up to at least 1 year.

我们在很大程度上忽视了个体差异在使用助记符中的作用。在教育背景下，最令人担忧的是衡量个体认知能力的差异。我们掌握的少量信息表明，学习能力低于平均水平的学生在学习相当简单的关系材料时，不会从关键词助记符中受益（Konopak & Williams，1988）。考虑到助记符的复杂性，这个结果并不令人意外。这也与我们将在下一章中看到的结果一致，表明助记符对认知康复的益处与损伤的严重程度成反比。无论如何，需要对健康人群进行更多研究，以了解个体认知能力差异与特定助记符及其应用材料之间的关系。

We are largely ignorant of the role of individual differences in the use of mnemonics. Of most concern in the education context are measures of individual difference in cognitive abilities. What little information we have suggests that students of below average learning ability do not benefit from keyword mnemonics when learning fairly simple relational material (Konopak & Williams, 1988). This result is not terribly surprising given the complexity of the mnemonic. It also is consistent with results that we shall see in the next chapter showing that the benefit of mnemonics for cognitive rehabilitation is inversely related to the severity of the damage. Regardless, more research is needed with healthy people on the effects of individual differences in cognitive ability as a function of the particular mnemonic and the material to which it is applied.

最后一个问题才是最重要的。在确定助记符之前，从业者必须为学习者设定一个明确的目标。这种关注点不仅在于材料的选择，还在于学生究竟应该从这些材料中获取什么。逐字记忆是助记符相对直接且明显的目标，但教育的很大一部分面向“理解”。从表面上看，理解过程似乎与助记符的使用是对立的，历史上，这种不相容的关系被大肆渲染，通常是那些批评在教育中使用助记符的人。然而，理解和记忆的心理过程之间存在着一种共生关系。“加工层次”的概念（Craik & Lockhart，1972）的前提是记忆是理解的副产品，大量实验表明，即使在完全没有记忆意图的情况下，对言语材料进行有意义的加工也能产生更佳的记忆。虽然很少有基于有意义关系的助记符与基于表层关系的助记符进行直接比较的研究，但我们回顾了一些证据表明，在助记符中构建意义有利于后期记忆。同样，我们回顾的一些证据表明，使用助记符所带来的记忆优势，在学生日后在新情境中运用相关材料时也发挥了重要作用。换句话说，记忆有助于日后对类似材料的理解。因此，我们建议，如果可能的话，应构建与目标材料含义相关的助记符。

The last issue should be the top concern. The practitioner must have a clear goal for the learner before settling on a mnemonic. This concern goes beyond selection of material to the question of exactly what the student is expected to take from that material. Verbatim memory is a relatively straightforward and obvious target for mnemonic devices, but much of education is geared to “understanding.” The process of comprehension seems, on the face of it, to be antithetical to the use of mnemonics, and historically much has been made of this incompatible relationship, usually by critics of the use of mnemonics in education. There is, however, a symbiotic relationship between the psychological processes of comprehension and of memory. The idea of levels of processing (Craik & Lockhart, 1972) was premised on the notion that memory is a by-product of comprehension, and reams of experiments have demonstrated that meaningful processing of verbal material yields superior memory, even in the total absence of intent to remember. Although few direct comparisons of mnemonics based on meaningful relationships versus those based on surface-level relationships exist, we have reviewed some evidence that suggests that building meaning in the mnemonic is beneficial for later memory. Likewise, some of the evidence we have reviewed suggests that the memory advantage conveyed by the use of mnemonics served the student well in later use of the material in a new situation. In other words, memory facilitates later understanding of similar material. Thus, the recommendation is that if at all possible, mnemonics be constructed such that the device is related to the meaning of the target material.

八

摄氏度哈一个磷T埃R		 

认知康复中的助记符

Mnemonics in Cognitive Rehabilitation

在美国，每年约有150万人因车祸、跌倒、袭击、枪伤和运动损伤而遭受创伤性脑损伤 (TBI)，其中约有8万至9万人每年会患上长期残疾(Thurman、Alverson、Dunn、Guerrero & Sniezek, 1999)。还有大量（但数量不详）的人会遭受由脑病变、缺氧、肿瘤、动脉瘤、血管畸形和脑部感染引起的非创伤性脑损伤，这些损伤同样会造成残疾。此外，约有530万人患有阿尔茨海默病，70岁以上人口中20%患有轻度认知障碍 (Alzheimer's Association, 2009)。随着人口老龄化，绝对数字还会进一步膨胀。还有数百万人患有各种认知功能障碍疾病，例如精神分裂症（220万）、癫痫（200万）和帕金森病（100万）。无论病因和行为表现如何多样，这些不同类型的损伤和疾病都会导致严重的精神功能障碍，而有效的认知康复都能帮助所有人。本文提供的估计数字表明，该领域的研究和开发需求迫切。

Each year in the United States, an estimated 1.5 million people sustain a traumatic brain injury (TBI) as the result of car accidents, falls, assaults, gunshot wounds, and sports injuries, and an estimated 80,000 to 90,000 of these people will experience the onset of long-term disability each year (Thurman, Alverson, Dunn, Guerrero, & Sniezek, 1999). A large but unknown number of people will suffer nontraumatic brain injuries caused by brain lesions, anoxia, tumors, aneurysm, vascular malformation, and infections of the brain that are equally disabling. Add to these figures the estimated 5.3 million people with Alzheimer’s disease along with 20% of the population older than age 70 afflicted with mild cognitive impairment (Alzheimer’s Association, 2009). The absolute numbers will inflate with the aging of the population. Millions more people suffer from various cognitively debilitating diseases such as schizophrenia (2.2 million), epilepsy (2 million), and Parkinson’s disease (1 million). However diverse the etiology and the behavioral manifestations, these various forms of injury and illness cause severe mental dysfunction, and all would benefit from effective cognitive rehabilitation. The estimates provided here are indicative of the urgent need for research and development in this field.

几乎所有导致严重认知功能障碍的损伤或疾病都伴有明显的记忆丧失。在某些情况下，例如阿尔茨海默病，记忆丧失是出现问题的最初迹象；而在其他情况下，例如创伤性脑损伤 (TBI)，记忆恢复的程度则是预后和恢复日常工作的晴雨表。因此，尽管记忆只是认知康复的目标之一，但由于记忆对学习和其他认知功能的重要性，它对整个康复训练至关重要。在这方面，记忆在认知康复中的作用类似于其在古典修辞学中的作用。记忆是将其他训练内容转化为行为的载体。正如记忆术训练补充了修辞学中的自然记忆一样，或许有人会认为记忆训练可以成为认知康复的一个有效组成部分。事实上，我们现在已经掌握了大量关于将记忆训练应用于各种记忆功能障碍病例的信息，本章旨在概述记忆训练在康复服务中所涉及的相关问题。我们不会尝试对已发表的记忆康复文献进行详尽的回顾，因为已有几篇关于此类文献的详尽评论可供参考（Halligan & Wade, 2005; High, Sander, Struchen, & Hart, 2005; Parenté & Herrmann, 2003; Wilson, 2007）。

Almost all injuries or diseases that result in significant cognitive dysfunction involve noticeable memory losses. In some cases such as Alzheimer’s disease, the memory loss is the first indication of a problem, and in other instances such as TBI, the extent of memory recovery is the barometer for prognosis and return to a productive routine. Thus, although memory is only one target of cognitive rehabilitation, it is fundamental to the entire exercise because of the importance of memory for learning and other cognitive functions. In that regard, the role of memory in cognitive rehabilitation is analogous to its role in classical rhetoric. Memory is the vehicle that carries the products of other parts of the training into behavior. Just as training in mnemonics supplemented natural memory in rhetoric, one might imagine that mnemonic training could be a useful component of cognitive rehabilitation. Indeed, we now have a good deal of information concerning the application of mnemonics to various cases of memory dysfunction, and the purpose of this chapter is to provide an overview of the issues associated with mnemonic training in service of rehabilitation. We do not attempt an exhaustive review of the published literature on the rehabilitation of memory, as several extensive reviews of that literature are available (Halligan & Wade, 2005; High, Sander, Struchen, & Hart, 2005, Parenté & Herrmann, 2003; Wilson, 2007).

□认知康复的目标

□ Goals of Cognitive Rehabilitation

认知康复被定义为试图缓解或改善因受伤或疾病导致脑损伤而致残患者的认知缺陷的过程 (Wilson, 2007)。认知康复与许多医学治疗不同，它要求患者积极参与康复过程，包括协助制定和执行治疗计划。例如，Parenté 和 Stapleton (1993) 报告称，如果其他接受过更深入治疗的患者实际建议并教授记忆术，TBI 患者会更容易学会记忆术，因为 TBI 患者相信其他患者能够以治疗师无法理解的方式感同身受地理解他们的问题。当然，患者参与计划制定的程度需要患者具备足够的认知功能水平，以识别重要的缺陷。

Cognitive rehabilitation has been defined as a process that attempts to alleviate or ameliorate cognitive deficits suffered by people disabled by brain damage resulting from injury or disease (Wilson, 2007). Cognitive rehabilitation differs from many medical treatments in that it requires the patient to take an active role in the rehabilitation process, including assisting in the formulation and administration of the treatment plan. For example, Parenté and Stapleton (1993) reported that TBI patients learned mnemonic techniques much more readily if other patients who were more advanced in therapy actually suggested and taught the mnemonics, because the TBI patients trusted their fellow patient to empathize with their problem in a way the therapist could not. Of course, the extent of the patient’s involvement in the formulation of the plan requires a level of cognitive functioning sufficient to recognize the important deficits.

此外，与大多数医学治疗不同的是，认知康复项目往往在治疗整体关注社交和情感缺陷以及认知缺陷时最为有效，因为其目标是帮助患者恢复正常生活（项目示例，参见 Parenté & Herrmann, 2003；Wilson, Herbert & Shiel, 2003）。每个项目都包含一个专门用于记忆的组成部分，而这正是我们在本章中探讨的康复的这一特定组成部分。

Also unlike most medical treatments, programs of cognitive rehabilitation tend to be most effective when the treatment focuses holistically on social and emotional deficits as well as cognitive deficits because the goal is to allow the individuals to return to their normal environment (for examples of programs, see Parenté & Herrmann, 2003; Wilson, Herbert, & Shiel, 2003). Embedded within every program is a component devoted to memory, and it is that specific component of rehabilitation that we examine in this chapter.

“康复”一词的正常用法是指恢复到某种先前的状态，例如药物康复或膝关节手术后的物理康复。遗憾的是，在严重脑损伤后，这样的记忆恢复目标可能无法实现。因此，我们将以损伤和残疾之间的区别为指导进行文献讨论（Glisky，2005；Wade，2005）。根据世界卫生组织（2001）的定义，损伤是一种旨在理解临床观察结果的概念，而残疾则是由损伤导致的具体行为功能障碍。记忆的成功治疗损伤会使记忆恢复到患病或受伤前的状态。我们知道在某些情况下这是不可能的。例如，阿尔茨海默病患者无法恢复之前的记忆功能。证据也表明脑炎也存在类似的结论（Funnel & De Mornay Davis, 1996; Wilson, Baddeley, & Kapur, 1995）。这类病例的治疗目标侧重于损伤导致的残疾，以期减少日常生活中的问题。

The normal usage of the word rehabilitation connotes restoration to some former state, as in, for example, drug rehabilitation or physical rehabilitation following knee surgery. Unfortunately, such a goal for memory in the wake of serious brain injury can be unreachable. For this reason, our discussion of the literature will be guided by the distinction between impairment and disability (Glisky, 2005; Wade, 2005). As defined by the World Health Organization (2001), impairment is a construct designed to make sense of clinical observations, whereas disability is a concrete behavioral dysfunction caused by the impairment. Successful treatment of memory impairment would restore memory to its predisease or preinjury state. We know this is not possible in some cases. For example, recovery of prior memory functioning will not happen in patients with Alzheimer’s disease. Evidence also indicates a similar conclusion for encephalitis (Funnel & De Mornay Davis, 1996; Wilson, Baddeley, & Kapur, 1995). The goal of treatment in such cases focuses on the disabilities caused by impairment in hopes of reducing problems of everyday life.

相比之下，一些脑损伤后出现的创伤后遗忘症病例通常会表现出相当程度的自发性恢复，有时甚至会完全恢复记忆。在许多此类病例中，创伤后遗忘症期后挥之不去的记忆障碍在接受记忆治疗后会得到改善。然而，关于后天性脑损伤的文献中一致发现，记忆障碍康复的效果与脑损伤的严重程度成反比。严重脑损伤后的记忆障碍对治疗没有反应 (Wilson, 2005)，而对于严重脑损伤，治疗的重点应该放在由此产生的残疾上。

In contrast, some cases of posttraumatic amnesia following brain injury often show considerable spontaneous recovery, sometimes to complete restoration of memory. In many of these cases, the lingering memory impairment following the posttraumatic amnesia period improves following mnemonic treatment. However, a consistent finding across the literature on acquired brain injury is that the effectiveness of rehabilitation of impaired memory is inversely related to the severity of the brain damage. Memory impairment following severe brain damage does not respond to treatment (Wilson, 2005), and in the case of severe brain damage, the therapeutic focus is better placed on the resulting disabilities.

当治疗的目标是改善受损的记忆时，最常用的技术是练习。其原理是受损的记忆过程可以通过练习来恢复，就像人们可以通过使用它来恢复手术损伤的膝盖一样。正如我们将看到的，现有文献并不鼓励这种方法。当目标转向治疗由损伤导致的残疾时，已经取得了一些进展。有两种技术在这里很有前景。一种是教授针对特定残疾的记忆策略，这些策略可用于支持学习新信息或记忆特定活动。第二种技术是使用外部助记符。这里可以采用多种选项，涵盖技术复杂程度的各个方面。

When the goal of treatment is ameliorating impaired memory, the technique used most often is drill. The rationale is that impaired memory processes can be rehabilitated by practice, much as one might rehabilitate a surgically damaged knee by using it. As we shall see, extant literature does not offer much encouragement for this approach. When the goal shifts to treating the disabilities resulting from the impairment, some headway has been made. Two techniques are quite promising here. One is teaching memory strategies targeted to particular disabilities, which are used to support either learning of new information or memory for particular activities. The second technique is the use of external mnemonic aids. A wide range of options is available to be employed here, spanning the dimension of technological sophistication.

□ 记忆受损的记忆技巧

□ Mnemonic Techniques for

Impaired Memory

上述治疗方法的目标各不相同，从修复受损的记忆过程到补偿受损过程的行为。当然，认知康复计划可能会尝试两者兼顾，但考虑到受损过程与由损伤导致的残疾之间的区别，Wilson（2005）认为，几乎没有证据表明可以恢复受损的记忆过程，只有零星的证据表明内部记忆术有助于巩固这些过程。同时，Wilson 指出，内部记忆术和外部记忆术对治疗记忆障碍很有帮助，可以让患者重返需要记忆的日常工作。在下一节中，我们将探讨一些得出这一结论的研究。

The approaches to treatment outlined above vary in their targeted goals from repairing impaired memory processes to compensating behavior for those impaired processes. Of course, a program of cognitive rehabilitation might try to do both, but keeping in mind the distinction between impaired processes and disabilities resulting from the impairment, Wilson (2005) argued that there is little evidence for restoration of impaired memory processes and only scattered evidence that internal mnemonics help shore up those processes. At the same time, Wilson showed that both internal and external mnemonics are useful for treating memory-related disabilities, allowing patients to return to everyday tasks that require memory. In the following section, we shall examine some of the research that leads to such a conclusion.

直接训练记忆过程

Direct Training of Memory Processes

现有证据表明，直接记忆训练对于恢复受损记忆的正常功能无效（例如，Benedict、Brandt 和 Bergey，1993 年；Godfrey 和 Knight，1985 年；Middleton、Lambert 和 Seggar，1991 年）。作为这种方法的一个例子，Godfrey 和 Knight（1985 年）比较了直接记忆训练与对照组（对照组进行以社交技能训练为重点的活动）的效果。所有参与者均为失忆型酗酒者。记忆训练包括联想学习、随后的回忆任务、图片识别训练以及对近期事件记忆的练习。两种条件下的训练课程均为 60 分钟，每周进行 4 次，持续 8 周。在训练前和训练 4 周后进行了一系列记忆评估。后测结果显示，记忆训练组并无优势。虽然本研究的结论受到样本量较小（每种情况下仅 6 名患者）的限制，但这些数据与其他报告的数据一致。在大多数情况下，直接训练有助于学习所学内容，但训练效果并不能推广到其他领域。几乎没有证据表明受损的记忆功能能够恢复到最初自发恢复的水平以上，无论是通过直接训练还是其他任何方式（例如，Kapur、Glisky & Wilson，2002）。

The available evidence indicates that direct training of memory is ineffective for purposes of restoring impaired memory to its normal function (e.g., Benedict, Brandt, & Bergey, 1993; Godfrey & Knight, 1985; Middleton, Lambert, & Seggar, 1991). As an example of this approach, Godfrey and Knight (1985) compared the effect of direct memory training against a control condition that engaged in activities focusing on social skills training. All participants were amnesiac alcoholics. The memory training included associate learning followed by recall tasks, picture recognition training, and practice in retaining memory for recent events. The sessions for both conditions lasted 60 minutes and occurred four times a week for 8 weeks. A battery of memory assessments was administered before the training and 4 weeks after training. Performance on the posttest showed no advantage for the memory training group. Although conclusions from this particular study are qualified by a small sample size, 6 patients in each condition, nonetheless these data are consistent with those reported by others. In most cases, direct training facilitates learning of the trained material, but the effect of training does not generalize beyond those materials. There is little evidence that impaired memory function can be restored beyond the level of initial spontaneous recovery, whether by direct training or any other means (e.g., Kapur, Glisky, & Wilson, 2002).

教授记忆策略

Teaching Memory Strategies

另一种常用的治疗记忆障碍的方法是教授一些在健康个体的实验室研究中也能提高记忆力的策略。人们使用了各种各样的策略，包括精细化和组织化，但大部分精力都集中在想象训练上。Richardson（1995）通过文献综述得出结论，想象训练的效果差异很大，并提出了一些导致这种差异的重要因素。或许最值得注意的是，想象训练的效果与记忆障碍的严重程度成反比。这几乎可以肯定是由于学习想象策略的难度造成的。例如，即使是中度记忆障碍，像挂钩词技术这样更复杂的策略也会产生非常糟糕的效果。Richardson指出的一个重大问题是缺乏日常记忆的泛化，这本身可能是由于未能记住使用该策略造成的。总体而言，针对功能中性材料的策略训练并无益处（Gade，1994；Kaschel 等，2002；Richardson，1995）。

Another frequently used approach for treating memory impairment is teaching strategies that also increase memory in laboratory research with healthy individuals. A variety of strategies have been used including elaboration and organization, but the majority of the effort has been devoted to imagery. Richardson (1995) concluded from his review of the literature that the effects of imagery training are highly variable, and he isolated some important contributions to this variability. Perhaps most notable is that the effects of imagery training are inversely related to the severity of the memory impairment. This fact is almost certainly attributable to the difficulty of acquiring the imagery strategy. For example, more complex strategies such as the peg-word technique yield very poor outcomes even with moderate impairment. A significant problem noted by Richardson is the lack of generalization to everyday memory, which itself may be due to the failure to remember to use the strategy. On the whole, strategy training on functionally neutral material is not beneficial (Gade, 1994; Kaschel et al., 2002; Richardson, 1995).

另一方面，策略训练在治疗记忆障碍引起的障碍方面取得了积极的成果。例如，Kaschel 及其同事（2002）将一个为期 10 周、包含 30 个课程的强化想象训练计划与患者在治疗中接受的标准记忆训练计划进行了比较。训练从练习生成常见物体的简单图像开始，逐渐进展到对患者选择的个性化任务进行更复杂的想象。在训练 3 个月后的随访测试中，想象组的表现优于标准治疗组，而且令人印象深刻的是，这种优势延伸到了日常活动中。Kaschel 等人指出，在最轻度障碍的情况下，获益最大。尽管如此，这些数据仍然为策略训练对特定障碍的效用提供了一些鼓励。

On the other hand, strategy training has yielded positive outcomes when treating disabilities engendered by memory impairment. For example, Kaschel and colleagues (2002) compared an intense imagery training program consisting of 30 sessions over a 10-week period against the same schedule using the standard memory training the patients would have received in their therapy. Training began with exercise in generating simple images of common objects and progressed to more complex imagery of individualized tasks selected by the patients. On a follow-up test 3 months after training, the imagery group performed better than the standard treatment group, and impressively this advantage extended to everyday activities. Kaschel et al. noted the caveat that the benefits were greatest in cases of mildest impairment. Nonetheless, these data offer some encouragement for the utility of strategy training on targeted disabilities.

Kaschel 等人的程序之所以能够成功地将记忆推广到日常活动中，很大程度上归功于患者选择了与他们生活相关的任务。事实上，受损患者可以有效地运用内部记忆策略来记住策略训练的材料，但几乎没有证据表明他们能够将记忆推广到其他材料之外 (Rees, Marshall, Hartridge, Mackie & Weiser, 2007)。因此，策略训练的任何持久益处都必须针对记忆障碍所致行为障碍的特定方面。秉持这一目标，研究已在策略操作辅助新学习的背景下取得了积极的成果。这一结果令人鼓舞，因为人们可以针对特定的技能或知识，然后在习得该行为或知识的过程中运用特定的策略。

The success of Kaschel et al.’s procedure in obtaining generalization to everyday activities owes much to the fact that patients selected the tasks that were relevant to their lives. Indeed, internal mnemonic strategies can be used effectively by impaired patients to remember the material on which the strategy was trained, but there is little evidence of generalization beyond those materials (Rees, Marshall, Hartridge, Mackie, & Weiser, 2007). Thus any lasting benefit from strategy training must target specific aspects of behavior disabled by memory impairment. With that goal in mind, research has yielded positive results of strategy manipulations in the context of assisting new learning. This result is encouraging in that one can target a particular skill or bit of knowledge and then employ particular strategies in the acquisition of that behavior or knowledge.

无错学习是一种备受关注的技术。无错学习是通过设计一个习得阶段来消除任何错误可能性来实现的。Baddeley 和 Wilson (1994) 的研究就是一个很好的例子。在这项研究中，失忆症患者、健康的老年人和健康的年轻人被要求学习一串单词。在一种情况下，学习是通过反复试验进行的。对于每个单词，参与者都会获得以下类型的信息：“我正在想一个以 DE 开头的五个字母的单词。你能猜出这个词是什么吗？” 猜出之后，参与者会被告知这个单词。这种条件的目的是在学习试验中引入错误。在第二种情况下，学习试验没有错误地进行。例如，为每个单词提供的信息的形式是“我正在想一个以 DE 开头的五个字母的单词，这个单词是 DEALT”。所有组的无错试验结果都对单词列表的记忆最好，但失忆组的优势最大。无错学习程序已应用于失忆症患者，范围从教他们计算机技术的各个方面（Glisky & Schacter，1989）到了解他们的治疗师的名字（Wilson，Baddeley，Evans & Shiel，1994）。

One technique that has received considerable attention is the use of errorless learning. Errorless learning is engineered by designing an acquisition phase that eliminates any possibility of error. A nice example of this approach is the work of Baddeley and Wilson (1994). In this research, amnesic patients, healthy older adults, and healthy younger adults were required to learn a list of words. In one condition, the learning was by trial and error. For each word, the participants were given information of the following kind: “I am thinking of a five-letter word that begins with DE. Can you guess what the word is?” After the guess, the participant was told the word. The purpose of this condition was to induce errors in the learning trial. In a second condition, the learning trial proceeded without errors. For example, the information provided for each word was in the form of “I am thinking of a five-letter word that begins with DE, and the word is DEALT.” Memory for the words in the list was best in the errorless trial for all groups, but the advantage was greatest in the amnesic group. The errorless learning procedure has been applied with amnesic patients in situations ranging from teaching them aspects of computer technology (Glisky & Schacter, 1989) to learning their therapist’s name (Wilson, Baddeley, Evans, & Shiel, 1994).

该技术的原理基于有意识控制的认知过程和自动过程之间的理论区别（Jacoby，1991），并基于记忆障碍是由于有意识控制过程的缺陷而产生的假设（例如，Cermak、Verfaellie、Butler 和 Jacoby，1993），将其应用于记忆障碍。由于无错学习过程依赖于支持自动从记忆中检索的线索，因此受损个体能够利用先前的学习成果，而如果检索需要受控过程，则这是不可能的（例如，Glisky 和 ​​Schacter，1989）。此外，初始学习期间所犯的错误会对未来的行为产生自动影响，导致错误的持续存在。抑制这些错误需要有意识控制的过程来抵消先前错误的自动影响，但记忆障碍会消除有意识控制的记忆。因此，无错学习非常适合针对性行为障碍的康复。

The rationale for the technique is grounded in the theoretical distinction between consciously controlled cognitive and automatic processes (Jacoby, 1991) and is applied to memory disabilities on the assumption that memory impairment is a deficit in consciously controlled processes (e.g., Cermak, Verfaellie, Butler, & Jacoby, 1993). Because errorless learning procedures rely on cues that support automatic retrieval from memory, the impaired individual is able to capitalize on previous learning in ways that would not be possible if retrieval required controlled processes (e.g., Glisky & Schacter, 1989). Moreover, errors committed during initial learning can exert automatic influences on behavior in the future, leading to perseveration of the errors. Suppressing these errors requires the opposition of the automatic influence of the previous error by consciously controlled processes, but memory impairment eliminates consciously controlled memory. Thus, errorless learning is well suited for rehabilitation of targeted behavioral disabilities.

外部助记符

External Mnemonic Aids

治疗伴随记忆障碍的另一种有效方法是使用外部记忆辅助工具。外部辅助工具往往比内部记忆策略更容易使用，这或许可以解释人们在日常生活中更倾向于使用外部辅助工具而非内部记忆策略（Long 等人，1999），而且大多数外部辅助工具的应用都能轻松针对个体的特定障碍。与正常记忆一样，用于辅助记忆障碍者的辅助工具种类繁多，从简单的提醒便笺到计算机控制的寻呼系统，不一而足。有效使用外部辅助工具的最大障碍在于，记忆力通常是必不可少的。因此，记忆障碍者在学习使用辅助工具时需要大量的支持，而某些技术先进的辅助工具的复杂性甚至超出了记忆障碍者的能力。

Another effective means for treating disabilities accompanying memory impairment is the use of external memory aids. External aids tend to be easier to use than internal mnemonic strategies, which may account for people’s preference for external aids over strategies in their daily lives (Long et al., 1999), and most applications of external aids easily target specific disabilities for the individual. As is the case with normal memory, the aids used to assist the memory-impaired individual run the gamut from simple reminder notes to computer-controlled paging systems. The most serious obstacle to the effective use of external aids is that memory often is required. Thus, the impaired individual needs considerable support while learning to use the aid, and in some cases of technologically sophisticated aids, the complexity will exceed the ability of the impaired person.

大量证据表明，外部辅助具有非常明显且强大的有益影响（详见 Kapur 等人，2002；Sohlberg，2005）。Wilson、JC 和 Hughes（1997）报道了一个有趣的例子：一位患有严重失忆症的年轻人 JC 开发了自己的补偿策略系统。JC 坚持写日记，详细记录了他在制定有效策略过程中的成功和失败。JC 的姑姑在同一时期保存的笔记也补充了这些信息。利用这些资源，Wilson 等人（1997）追踪了 JC 从失忆中恢复后的 10 年进展。因脑出血导致的失忆症而接受了手术。尽管在那十年之后，他仍然严重失忆，但他已经能够独立生活，完全独立。他之所以能够成功，部分原因在于他的记忆障碍并未伴随其他认知障碍，但如果没有他所制定的策略，JC 的独立生活是不可能实现的。正如 Wilson 等人（1997）所描述的，这些策略最初是简单的自我记录，后来逐渐发展到包括一些辅助工具，例如数据库手表、用于提醒即将到来的约会的个人记事本，以及一台小型录音机（用于记录重要事件的发生，以便日后复习）。通过观察自己的错误，他养成了将需要记住的信息保存在两个独立系统中的习惯。虽然这些记忆支持不足以让他继续在剑桥大学学习法律，但 JC 能够独立生活，这充分证明了即使是相当简单的外部记忆术也能克服严重失忆症带来的障碍。

Considerable evidence exists showing very clear and strong beneficial influence of external aids (for reviews, see Kapur et al., 2002; Sohlberg, 2005). Wilson, J. C., and Hughes (1997) reported an interesting example of a severely amnesic young man, J. C., who developed his own system of compensatory strategies. J. C. kept a diary containing extensive notes of his successes and failures in his efforts to develop effective strategies. That information was complemented by the notes maintained by J. C.’s aunt during the same period. Drawing on these resources, Wilson et al. (1997) were able to track J. C.’s progress for 10 years after his recovery from surgery for the cerebral hemorrhage that caused the amnesia. Although he was still densely amnesic after that 10-year period, he was living on his own and was completely independent. In part that success was due to the fact that his memory impairment is not accompanied by other cognitive impairments, but J. C.’s independence could not have been achieved without the strategies he developed. As described by Wilson et al. (1997), these strategies began with simple notes to himself and evolved to include aids such as a databank watch, a personal organizer to remind him of imminent appointments, and a small tape recorder on which he recorded important events as they happened so that he could review them later. Through observing his own errors, he developed the habit of keeping information he needed to remember in two separate systems. Although these mnemonic supports were not sufficient to allow him to resume his studies of law at Cambridge, J. C.’s ability to live on his own is an important example of the power of even rather simple external mnemonics to overcome the disabilities imposed even by severe amnesia.

另一种低技术干预措施是记忆簿。记忆簿包含姓名、地址以及个人认为重要但经常被遗忘的日常活动的提醒。记忆簿还留有空间供个人记录事件发生时的情况，以支持日后的记忆。一些研究报告了使用记忆簿的一些益处（例如，Donaghy & Williams，1998；Owensworth & MacFarland，1999）。这些研究也提醒人们，需要对记忆簿的使用进行明确而系统的训练才能获得益处。

Another low-technology intervention is the memory book. The memory book contains names and addresses as well as reminders about daily activities that the individual has designated as important but frequently forgotten. The book also has space for the individual to record events as they happen, which can be used to support later memory. Several studies have reported some benefit through the use of memory books (e.g., Donaghy & Williams, 1998; Owensworth & MacFarland, 1999). These same studies have cautioned that explicit and systematic training in the use of the memory book is required to obtain benefits.

高科技设备在康复领域正变得越来越普遍，这反映了普通人群越来越多地使用此类设备来辅助记忆和组织能力的趋势。一些非残疾人士使用的设备也已在残疾人群体中试用。例如，Van Den Broek 及其同事（2000）为一组5名脑损伤患者提供了一个语音组织器，这是一种类似录音机的简单设备，允许患者自行录制信息。这些带有信息提醒功能的设备在减少患者在向他人传递信息和执行日常琐事等特定任务中的记忆障碍方面非常有效。

High-tech devices are becoming much more common in rehabilitation, mirroring the trend in the general population of increased use of such devices to assist memory and organization. Some of the devices used by the nondisabled population have been tried with impaired groups. For example, Van Den Broek and colleagues (2000) provided a group of 5 brain-damaged patients with a voice-organizer, which was a simple Dictaphone-like device that allowed the patients to self-record messages. The devices with accompanying message alarm functions were effective in reducing memory failures for the specific tasks of delivering a message to another person and performing routine chores.

如今，越来越多专为记忆障碍人士设计的设备问世，其中一些设备已经过仔细评估。一些专为记忆障碍人士设计的寻呼系统取得了令人鼓舞的成果（有关各种设备及其支持系统的描述，请参阅 Sohlberg，2005）。在这些系统中，研究最透彻的或许是 NeuroPage（Hersh & Treadgold，1994），它是一款带屏幕的手持设备，可以连接到中央计算机，也可以通过电话连接到寻呼公司。提醒事项的安排被输入到计算机中，并且在适当的时间，提醒信息会被传输到终端，终端会将其转换为无线电信号发送给用户。收到提醒信息时，设备会发出视觉提示和听觉提示，并在屏幕上显示信息。重要的是，用户需要致电寻呼公司确认信息，如果用户未能确认，则会重新发送信息。该设备由一个大按钮控制，方便用户操作。一旦提醒信息输入计算机，就无需任何人工界面。

An increasing number of devices explicitly designed for the memory impaired are now available, and some of these have been evaluated rather carefully. Promising results have emerged from the use of paging systems specifically designed for use by memory-impaired people (see Sohlberg, 2005, for a description of various devices and their support systems). Perhaps the most thoroughly researched of these systems is NeuroPage (Hersh & Treadgold, 1994), which is a handheld device with a screen that is connected to a central computer as well as by telephone to a paging company. The scheduling of reminders is entered into the computer, and at the appropriate time the reminder is transmitted to the terminal where it is converted and sent as a radio signal to the individual user. When a reminder comes in, the device emits a visual cue and an auditory cue, and the message is displayed on the screen. Importantly, the user is requested to telephone the paging company to confirm the message, and if the user fails to do so, the message is resent. The device is controlled by one large button, making it simple for the user. Once the reminders are entered into the computer, no further human interface is required.

NeuroPage 系统已接受过多次评估，其中一次评估范围十分广泛。Wilson、Emslie、Quirk 和 Evans (2001) 进行了一项涉及 100 多名脑损伤患者的对照研究，这在该领域的研究中是一个很大的样本。在 2 周的基线期后，一组患者接受了 7 周的传呼机。对照组成员被列入传呼机等候名单，并继续接受常规治疗。7 周后，等候组开始使用传呼机，另一组停止使用。随后又进行了 5 周的目标行为观察。成功完成目标行为的百分比如图 8.1 所示。在初始基线期，两组之间没有差异，但此后，使用传呼机的组的表现明显优于未使用传呼机的组。

The NeuroPage system has been subjected to several evaluations, one of which was extensive. Wilson, Emslie, Quirk, and Evans (2001) conducted a controlled study involving over 100 brain-damaged patients, which is a large sample for research in this area. After a baseline period of 2 weeks, one group received the pager for 7 weeks. The control group members were placed on a waiting list for the pager and continued their usual therapy. After 7 weeks, the waiting group was put on the pager, and the other group was taken off. An additional 5 weeks of observation of target behaviors ensued. The percentage of target behaviors successfully completed is shown in Figure 8.1. At the initial baseline, no difference existed between the two groups, but after that point, the group that had a pager performed considerably better than the group without one.

NeuroPage 等寻呼系统的唯一真正缺点是，必须有人将调度信息传达给中央计算机编程。编程无法由个人用户完成。虽然编程也需要一些费用，但使用此类系统很可能通过提高受损患者的独立性来节省医疗保健费用。这些系统灵活，可以适应不同的诊断组以及特定组康复期的不同时间点。该技术的初步成功，加上其未来将变得更加强大和实用，构成了迄今为止记忆康复领域最有希望的进展。

The only real disadvantages of paging systems such as NeuroPage is that someone has to convey the scheduling information to a central computer for programming. The programming cannot be done by the individual user. Some expense also is involved, but it is very likely that the use of such systems will save health care money by enhancing the independence of impaired patients. These systems are flexible and can be adapted for use by different diagnostic groups and at different times in the recovery period for a particular group. The initial success of such technology coupled with the fact that the technology will become even more powerful and usable constitute the most promising developments to date in memory rehabilitation work.

图 8.1 A 组参与者在 T2（第 8、9 周）使用寻呼机，B 组参与者在 T3（第 15、16 周）使用寻呼机的成功率百分比。T1 为基线。摘自 Wilson, BA, Emslie, HC, Quirk, K. 和 Evans, J.，2001 年，《神经病学、神经外科和精神病学杂志》，第 70 卷。经许可转载。

Figure 8.1 Percentage success rate for participants in Group A, who had the pager at T2 (Weeks 8, 9), and for Group B, who had the pager at T3 (Weeks 15, 16). T1 is baseline. From Wilson, B. A., Emslie, H. C., Quirk, K., & Evans, J., 2001, Journal of Neurology, Neurosurgery, and Psychiatry, 70. With permission.

□ 评估记忆术在认知康复中的有效性

□ Evaluating the Effectiveness of

Mnemonics in Cognitive Rehabilitation

我们讨论的选定文献样本代表了目前大量关于记忆术在记忆康复中应用的已发表研究。我们已经看到，将脑损伤后的记忆过程恢复到其先前的功能水平通常是遥不可及的。这个结论并不令人惊讶，因为在许多情况下，支持特定记忆功能的大脑结构和过程遭到破坏，只有再生组织才能恢复原来的记忆过程。另一方面，一些记忆技术似乎确实可以改善（甚至消除）记忆障碍造成的障碍。但是，我们目前是否有足够的了解，可以有信心地向患者及其家属推荐强化记忆疗法具有临床效果？

The select sample of the literature that we have discussed is representative of what is now a fairly large number of published studies on the application of mnemonics in memory rehabilitation. We have seen that the restoration of memory processes following brain damage to their prior level of function is usually out of reach. This conclusion is not surprising because the brain structure and processes that support particular memory functions are destroyed in many cases, and nothing short of regenerating the tissue could restore the original memory processes. On the other hand, some mnemonic techniques do seem to ameliorate if not eliminate the disabilities caused by memory impairment. However, do we know enough at this point to recommend with some confidence to patients and their families that intensive mnemonic treatments will be clinically effective?

为了制定循证治疗指南，人们尝试以系统评价的形式回答这个问题。这些评价涵盖了认知康复的各个方面，但每篇评价都有专门的章节来讨论记忆康复。其中最雄心勃勃的评价是由 Cicerone 等人（2000 年、2005 年）提出的，涵盖了截至 2002 年的研究。他们的评价得出结论，有证据表明，对轻度受损病例进行记忆策略训练具有临床效果，这一结论几乎完全基于 Kaschel 等人（2002 年）的想象训练研究。根据 Wilson 等人（2001 年）对 NeuroPage 的研究，强烈建议在临床上使用外部辅助设备治疗中度至重度损伤。

Attempts to answer this question have come in the form of systematic reviews for purposes of establishing evidence-based treatment guidelines. These reviews cover all aspects of cognitive rehabilitation, but in each case specific sections are devoted to memory rehabilitation. The most ambitious of these has been provided by Cicerone and colleagues (2000, 2005), which cover research up to 2002. Their review concludes that there is some evidence for the clinical effectiveness of training memory strategies with mildly impaired cases, a conclusion based almost entirely on the imagery training study of Kaschel et al. (2002). A strong recommendation is given for the clinical use of external assistive devices for moderate to severe impairment based on the study of NeuroPage by Wilson et al. (2001).

Rees 和她的同事（2007）进行了另一项回顾，考察了 1986 年至 2006 年间发表的研究。他们的结论至少与 Cicerone 等人的结论一样，对记忆训练在改善残疾方面的临床价值充满信心。Rees 等人的结论是，有强有力的证据表明训练内部记忆是有效的策略，尽管他们确实指出，这些效果的持续时间尚不清楚，而且这些策略仅对轻度受损的病例有效。他们还发现了强有力的证据，证明外部辅助手段对更严重的病例有效。另一方面，Rees 等人同意 Wilson (2005) 的观点，即没有证据表明旨在恢复受损记忆过程的训练方案具有临床应用的有效性。

Rees and her colleagues (2007) provided another review that examined studies published between 1986 and 2006. Their conclusions were at least as enthusiastic as those of Cicerone et al. about the clinical value of memory training for ameliorating disabilities. Rees et al. concluded that there is strong evidence for the effectiveness of training internal memory strategies, although they did note that the duration of these effects is not known, and the strategies are effective only for mildly impaired cases. They also found strong evidence for the effectiveness of external aids with more severe cases. On the bleaker side, Rees et al. are in agreement with Wilson (2005) that there is no evidence for the effectiveness of training protocols designed to restore impaired memory processes that would justify clinical use.

Rohling、Faust、Beverly 和 Demakis（2009）发表的荟萃分析为各种疗法的临床应用提供了重要的定量评估。该分析尤其具有指导意义，因为它涵盖了 Cicerone 等人所审查的相同文献，使我们能够定量评估治疗效果，并与基于早期定性分析的结论进行比较。在 Cicerone 等人（2000 年、2005 年）审查的 258 篇文章中，115 篇包含足够的信息，可以纳入荟萃分析，其中 14 篇专门针对记忆。所有研究都符合两种常见的设计类型之一。一些设计是单组参与者，他们在治疗前后都接受了标准测量评估。其他研究包含独立的对照组，这些对照组在第一次和第二次测试之间未接受被认为对记忆有效的治疗。所有研究都采用了不同类型的控制活动，但在所有情况下，关注的结果是治疗组与对照组相比，治疗后测量值的改善。

A meta-analysis published by Rohling, Faust, Beverly, and Demakis (2009) provides an important quantitative evaluation for clinical use of various treatments. This analysis is especially informative because it covers the same literature reviewed by Cicerone et al., giving us a quantitative estimate of treatment effectiveness to compare with the conclusions based on the earlier qualitative analysis. Of the 258 articles reviewed by Cicerone et al. (2000, 2005), 115 contained sufficient information to be included in the meta-analysis, and of these 14 specifically targeted memory. All of the studies conformed to one of two general types of designs. Some designs were single groups of participants who were assessed on criterion measures both pre- and posttreatment. Other studies contained independent control groups that did not receive treatment thought to be effective for memory between the first and second test. Various types of control activities were used across the studies, but in all cases the outcome of interest was the improvement in the posttreatment measure for the treatment condition compared to the control condition.

不同类型的设计被证明是评估记忆康复效果的一个非常重要的变量。采用单组设计的研究得出的效应量与记忆治疗的强效效应相对应。另一方面，独立对照组设计的效应量非常小，统计上不可靠。然而，在分析过程中，研究人员发现了一个重要的问题。Rohling等人（2009）发现，在独立组设计中，单独对照条件下的效应量显著且中等大小。也就是说，在没有任何有效治疗的情况下，对照条件下的后测成绩显著提高。对照条件下的这种效应很可能是一种测试效应：参加第一次测试会提高第二次测试的成绩。在这些使用失忆症患者的研究中，测试效应的出现证明了自动记忆过程的重要性，但测试效应的存在对于解释采用单组设计的研究具有直接的影响。在单组设计中，治疗效应与测试效应相混淆，因此使得对这些单组设计实验中显著治疗效应的解释变得复杂。如果忽略这些研究得出的治疗效应，则荟萃分析并未得出任何关于记忆训练有效性的证据。总而言之，可以肯定地说，对有效记忆康复的支持与定性研究相比，本次元分析的结果要弱得多。

The different types of designs turned out to be a very important variable for evaluating the effectiveness of memory rehabilitation. Studies using a single-group design yielded effect sizes corresponding to strong effects of memory treatment. On the other hand, independent-controlgroup designs resulted in very small effect sizes that were not statistically reliable. However, in the course of this analysis, an important discovery was made. Rohling et al. (2009) found that the effect size for the control condition alone was significant and of a moderate size in the independent-group design. That is, the control conditions showed significant improvement on the posttest in the absence of any effective treatment. This effect in the control condition is most likely a test effect: having taking the first test enhances performance on a second test. That the test effect occurs in these studies using amnesic individuals is a testament to the importance of automatic memory processes, but the presence of a test effect has immediate implications for the interpretation of the studies using a single-group design. In the single-group design, the treatment effect is confounded with the test effect and consequently complicates interpretation of the large treatment effect from those single-group-design experiments. If the treatment effect yielded by those studies is dismissed, the meta-analysis produced no evidence for the effectiveness of memory training. All in all, one can safely say that the support for effective mnemonic rehabilitation is much weaker following this meta-analysis than it was from the qualitative studies.

□研究课题

□ Issues for Research

开展旨在评估康复临床效果的研究并非易事。获得目标人群的参与并获得他们的合作是一项挑战，而治疗的首要目标很少与严格控制的研究要求相符。如果要在设计完美的研究和根本不进行研究之间做出选择，那么我们掌握的关于治疗效果的很多信息肯定会不复存在。同时，判断康复效果的能力直接取决于现有信息的质量。我们对文献的回顾清楚地表明，我们需要更多来自严格控制研究的数据，即使某些标准难以满足。

Performing research designed to assess the clinical effectiveness of rehabilitation is no easy task. Gaining access to and cooperation of target populations is a challenge, and the overriding goal of therapy is rarely compatible with the demands of highly controlled research. If the choice is between a perfectly designed study and no study at all, it is certain that much of the information we have about the effectiveness of treatment would not exist. At the same time, the ability to judge the effectiveness of rehabilitation is a direct function of the quality of the information available. Our overview of the literature makes clear that we need more data from well-controlled studies even though some of the criteria will be difficult to satisfy.

最重要的考虑因素之一是独立的对照组。Rohling 等人（2009）的研究结果极大地强调了解释单组重测设计结果的难度。测试效应可能很大，并与治疗效应完全混淆。此外，该领域的研究人员将从关于标准化对照条件下活动的讨论中受益。目前，对照组活动的内容在不同研究中差异很大，从完全不治疗到提供者的常规治疗方案。治疗持续时间也同样存在差异，这使得跨研究比较更加危险。

Among the most important considerations is an independent control group. The results of Rohling et al. (2009) dramatically emphasize the difficulty of interpreting the results from a single-group, test–retest design. The testing effect can be large and completely confounded with the treatment effect. Furthermore, researchers in this area would profit from some discussion about standardizing the activities of the control condition. As it currently stands, the content of the control group’s activities is highly variable across studies, ranging from no treatment at all to the normal treatment regime of the provider. Treatment duration is equally variable and renders comparison across studies even more hazardous.

另一个重要的考虑因素是，许多病因和年龄研究中存在潜在的混杂因素。例如，一个包含TBI和中风患者的脑损伤患者样本几乎肯定包含这种混杂因素，因为TBI的主要原因是车祸，这主要是年轻人的问题，而中风的概率会随着年龄的增长而增加。由于年龄对记忆有独立的影响，这种混杂因素可能会影响治疗效果。

Another important consideration is the potential confounding in many studies of etiology and age. For example, a sample of brain-damaged patients that includes both TBI and stroke patients almost certainly contains this confounding because the primary cause of TBI is automobile accidents, predominantly a young person’s problem, whereas the probability of stroke increases with age. This confounding can color the treatment effect because of the independent effect of age on memory.

脑损伤的严重程度是治疗效果的主要决定因素。严重脑损伤后的记忆似乎无法通过恢复记忆的尝试恢复，而轻度损伤则可以通过记忆训练获得一些益处。许多研究难以评估损伤的严重程度，而且跨研究进行此类评估也几乎不可能。事实上，Rohling 等人（2009）推测，他们与 Cicerone 等人（2000，2005）关于记忆治疗效果的建议之间的差异可能正是由于这个因素。也就是说，Rohling 等人在其荟萃分析中没有指标来排除严重程度，因此他们因为这个变量而崩溃了。Cicerone等人更积极的建议完全基于对轻度损伤个体的研究。同样，该领域的研究人员将从一些损伤严重程度的标准测量中受益匪浅。

The severity of the brain damage is a major determinant of treatment efficacy. Memory following severe brain damage appears to be impervious to attempts to restore that memory, whereas milder damage yields some benefit from memory training. In many studies, it is difficult to assess the severity of damage, and such assessment across studies is rarely possible. Indeed, Rohling et al. (2009) speculated that the differences between their recommendations and those of Cicerone et al. (2000, 2005) for the effectiveness of memory treatment may be due to this factor. That is, Rohling et al. had no metric to partial out severity in their meta-analysis, and hence they collapsed over that variable. Cicerone et al.’s more positive recommendations were based exclusively on studies using mildly impaired individuals. Again, researchers in this area would benefit enormously from some standard measure of severity of damage.

□健康老龄化

□ Healthy Aging

我们将以积极的态度结束本章，简要讨论记忆干预措施对正常衰老相关记忆衰退的影响。虽然健康衰老伴随的记忆缺陷在质量上不如脑损伤相关记忆缺陷那么严重，但随着年龄的增长，记忆力确实会明显下降。例如，一项对1000名年龄在35岁至80岁之间的参与者进行的研究表明，他们从55岁到60岁左右开始，情景记忆表现出现相当大的下降（Rönnlund、Nyberberg、Bäckman和Nilsson，2005）。幸运的是，现在有大量关于受衰老影响的基本记忆过程和康复技术对照研究的研究。这些后期研究报告了令人鼓舞的结果，不仅报告了可以补偿记忆缺陷的方法，还报告了似乎可以成功恢复潜在记忆过程的方法。

We shall end the chapter on a positive note with a brief discussion of mnemonic interventions in memory decline associated with normal aging. Although the memory deficit accompanying healthy aging is qualitatively less problematic than that associated with brain injury, noticeable memory decline does occur with age. For example, a study of 1, 000 participants between the ages of 35 and 80 who were tested on two occasions 5 years apart showed a rather large decline in episodic memory performance beginning around the age 55 to 60 (Rönnlund, Nyberberg, Bäckman, & Nilsson, 2005). Fortunately there now is a good bit of research available on both the basic memory processes affected by aging and controlled studies of rehabilitative techniques. Encouraging results have been reported from these later studies not only on methods that allow compensation for the memory deficit but also on approaches that appear to successfully rehabilitate the underlying memory process.

大量研究报告了训练对老年人情景记忆表现的影响。Verhaeghen、Marcoen 和 Goossens（1992）对这些研究进行了荟萃分析，比较了记忆训练前后的表现，并得出结论：与对照组相比，训练显著提高了受训组的表现。荟萃分析中涉及的记忆技巧包括位置法、姓名-面孔学习法和组织策略，结果表明，所审查研究中使用的各种技巧同样有效。令人鼓舞的是，一份报告显示，记忆策略生成训练在训练8个月后仍能持续提高老年人的表现（Derwinger、Neely 和 Bäckman，2005）。

A rather substantial number of studies reporting the effects of training on older adults’ episodic memory performance are available. In a metaanalysis of these studies that compared pre- and postmnemonic training performance, Verhaeghen, Marcoen, and Goossens (1992) concluded that training significantly improved performance of the trained group relative to control conditions. The mnemonic techniques entailed in the metaanalysis included method of loci, name–face learning, and organizational strategies, and the results showed that the various techniques used across the reviewed studies were equally effective. As encouraging is a report that training to generate memory strategies continued to benefit performance among older people 8 months after the training (Derwinger, Neely, & Bäckman, 2005).

Craik 及其同事 (2007) 报告了一项为期 12 周的多模块训练计划的结果，该计划针对 71 至 87 岁的健康成年人。该计划的记忆部分持续 4 周，包括关于记忆本质和如何提高表现的指导，以及内部和外部记忆策略的训练。评估在训练前进行，并在训练后 3 个月和 6 个月进行。相对于训练前的基线，训练后的表现在 6 个月的评估中持续提升。尽管作者提醒说，他们的结果可能是由于……的普遍影响整体训练计划，研究结果与 Derwinger 等人 (2005) 关于特定记忆训练益处的报告一致。

Craik and his colleagues (2007) reported the results of a 12-week multimodular training program involving healthy adults 71 to 87 years old. The memory portion of the program occurred over 4 weeks and included instruction on the nature of memory and how to improve performance as well as training on internal and external memory strategies. Assessment occurred prior to training and then 3 and 6 months subsequent to training. Relative to the pretraining baseline, posttraining performance showed gains that continued to increase at the 6-month assessment. Although the authors cautioned that their results may be due to general effects of the overall training program, the findings are consistent with Derwinger et al.’s (2005) report of specific memory training benefits.

从双加工理论的角度来看，衰老对基本记忆过程的影响一直是颇具前景的研究重点。正如本章前面所述，双加工理论假设记忆包含两种性质不同的记忆形式：受意识控制的过程（回忆），它能够获取先前经验的细节；以及自动化过程（熟悉性），它无法获取这些细节。Jacoby（例如，1999）已令人信服地证明，衰老会对受控加工产生不利影响，而过去的自动化影响则相对未受影响。这在一定程度上意味着，由于熟悉性而将不合适的信息带入脑海的自动化过程不会受到受控过程的阻碍，从而导致诸如重复错误之类的错误。

The locus of aging effects on basic memory processes has been the focus of promising research from the perspective of dual-process theory. As described earlier in this chapter, dual-process theory assumes that memory entails two qualitatively different forms of remembering: consciously controlled processes (recollection) that provide access to details of prior experience and automatic processes (familiarity) that do not access such details. Jacoby (e.g., 1999) has shown convincingly that aging has its detrimental effect on controlled processing, leaving automatic influences of the past relatively unscathed. In part this means that the automatic processes that bring inappropriate items to mind because of their familiarity are unopposed by controlled processes, leading to mistakes such as repetition errors.

基于这一理论分析，Jennings 和 Jacoby（2003）开发了一种训练记忆运用的技术。他们将这种方法称为“避免重复程序”。该程序非常简单。参与者学习一系列单词，以便日后记忆。接下来进行再认测试，参与者对已学过的单词回答“是”，对未学过的单词回答“否”。此外，他们还被正确地告知，一些未学过的单词会在测试中重复出现，但他们应该始终对未学过的单词回答“否”。仅凭熟悉度，老年人通常会对重复出现的新单词回答“是”。如果他们记得该单词之前在测试中出现过，熟悉度就会与该记忆相抵消，他们就会正确地对这些重复出现的单词回答“否”。为了训练老年人的记忆运用，Jennings 和 Jacoby 在测试开始时使用了一两个插入单词的极短时间间隔。滞后时间逐渐增加，具体速度取决于个人能否达到基于年轻人表现的预设标准。训练结束后，老年人的表现较训练前有显著提升，如今已达到与年轻人相当的水平。此外，这种益处持续了3个月。

On the basis of this theoretical analysis, Jennings and Jacoby (2003) developed a technique to train the use of recollection processes. They called their approach the avoiding-repetitions procedure. The procedure is quite simple. Participants study a list of words for later memory. A recognition test follows in which the participants say yes to the studied words and no to nonstudied words. Furthermore, they also are correctly told that some of the nonstudied words will be repeated in the test, but they should always say no to a nonstudied item. Relying on familiarity alone, the older individuals will often say yes to repeated new items. If they could recollect that the word had been shown previously in the test, familiarity would be opposed by that recollection, and they would correctly say no to these repeated lures. To train the use of recollection among the older individuals, Jennings and Jacoby used very short lags of one or two intervening items at the beginning of the test. The lags were gradually increased at a rate dependent on the individual’s ability to meet a preset criterion based on younger individuals’ performance. After training, the older adults showed marked improvement over their pretraining performance, now performing at a level equivalent to that of the younger adults. Moreover, the benefit persisted through a 3-month interval.

利用詹宁斯和雅各比所描述的理论和技术，托特、丹尼尔斯和雅各比（2005）开发了一款名为《艺术品经销商》的电脑游戏，专门用于训练记忆力。玩家的目标是通过参加30场私人艺术品拍卖会来收集世界级的艺术品收藏，玩家在拍卖会上尝试收购著名艺术家的原画。为了购买这些画作，玩家需要从一位金融家那里借钱，金融家还会向玩家提供即将拍卖的画作的信息。这些信息以著名艺术家作品的实际数字化版本的形式呈现，构成了该轮的记忆集。看完这些记忆集后，玩家继续前往拍卖会，在那里他/她一次看到一张图片，并且必须做出决定是否购买图片或通行证。根据游戏规则，原始套装中未出现的图片属于伪造品，应避免使用。这些伪造品会在销售过程中重复出现。在此背景下，Jennings 和 Jacoby 描述的避免重复程序得以实施。每次销售后，融资人都会提供反馈，玩家可以前往“画廊”查看藏品。融资是游戏的一部分，因为玩家偶尔可能需要从融资人那里借更多钱，但必须保持一定的余额，有时可以通过出售部分现有藏品来补充。因此，避免重复程序嵌入在一款在家玩的电子游戏中，但说明和描述从未提及该游戏是一种记忆训练工具。

Using the theory and techniques described by Jennings and Jacoby, Toth, Daniels, and Jacoby (2005) developed a computer game called Art Dealer constructed explicitly to train recollection.
